pageContext.other: Associations: Best check my interpretation of dittos. Bottom left of card says ”OK” and "? So cast for hammering into sheet". Bottom right of card says “CI” or “C1”.
pageContext.associations: 1-53: 17 Socketed Celts; 5 Fragments Socketed Celts; 2 Fragments Winged Celts?; 1 Chisel?; 1 Gouge; 1 Spearhead; 2 Fragments Spearhead; 6 Pieces of swords; 1 Knife or razor; 2 Pieces edge of vessel; 15 Copper cakes; 9 Fragments, various; 1 Billet
